verses.verse: Afterward he <S%H3212>brought<s%> me to the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> even the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looks<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east.<s%>

<S%H3519>Behold,<s%> the glory of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6921>east:<s%> and his <S%H6963>voice<s%> was like the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H4325>waters;<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H215>shined<s%> with his <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

It was according to the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision<s%> which I <S%H7200>saw,<s%> even according to the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> when I <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> and the <S%H4759>visions<s%> were like the <S%H4758>vision<s%> that I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> whose <S%H6440>prospect<s%> is <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6921>east.<s%>

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> took me <S%H5375>up,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H3519>behold,<s%> the glory of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
I <S%H8085>heard<s%> one <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to me out of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by <S%H681>me.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> this is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> where I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> The <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall no more <S%H2930>defile<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> neither <S%H4428>they,<s%> nor their kings, by their <S%H2184>prostitution,<s%> and by the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings<s%> in their high <S%H1116>places;<s%>

in their <S%H5414>setting<s%> of their <S%H5592>threshold<s%> by my <S%H5592>threshold,<s%> and their <S%H4201>doorpost<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> my <S%H4201>doorpost,<s%> and there was but the <S%H7023>wall<s%> between me and <S%H2930>them;<s%> and they have defiled my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> by their <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which they have <S%H6213>committed:<s%> therefore I have <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them in my <S%H639>anger.<s%>

Now let them put <S%H7368>away<s%> their <S%H2184>prostitution,<s%> and the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings,<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H7931>me;<s%> and I will dwell in their <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5046>show<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they may be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquities;<s%> and let them <S%H4058>measure<s%> the <S%H8508>pattern.<s%>

If they be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of all that they have <S%H6213>done,<s%> make <S%H3045>known<s%> to them the <S%H6699>form<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and its <S%H8498>fashion,<s%> and its <S%H4161>exits,<s%> and its <S%H4126>entrances,<s%> and all its <S%H6699>forms,<s%> and all its <S%H2708>ordinances,<s%> and all its <S%H6699>forms,<s%> and all its <S%H8451>laws;<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> it in their <S%H5869>sight;<s%> that they may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the whole <S%H6699>form<s%> of <S%H2708>it,<s%> and all its ordinances, and do <S%H6213>them.<s%>

This is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H1004>house:<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> the whole <S%H1366>limit<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> it shall be <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%> <S%H8451>Behold,<s%> this is the law of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

These are the <S%H4060>measures<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> by <S%H520>cubits<s%> (the <S%H520>cubit<s%> is a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%>): the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> shall be a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and the <S%H2948>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and its <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> its <S%H8193>edge<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2239>span;<s%> and this shall be the <S%H1354>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

From the <S%H2436>bottom<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%> to the <S%H8481>lower<s%> <S%H5835>ledge<s%> shall be <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H520>cubit;<s%> and from the <S%H6996>lesser<s%> <S%H5835>ledge<s%> to the <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H5835>ledge<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit.<s%>
The upper <S%H741>altar<s%> shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and from the <S%H741>altar<s%> hearth and <S%H4605>upward<s%> there shall be <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns.<s%>
The <S%H741>altar<s%> hearth shall be <S%H8147>twelve<s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%> by <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> <S%H7251>square<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> sides of <S%H7253>it.<s%>

The <S%H5835>ledge<s%> shall be <S%H702>fourteen<s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%> by <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides<s%> of <S%H1366>it;<s%> and the border <S%H5439>about<s%> it shall be <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H520>cubit;<s%> and its <S%H2436>bottom<s%> shall be a <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H5439>around;<s%> and its <S%H4609>steps<s%> shall <S%H6437>look<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> These are the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H5927>it,<s%> to offer burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> <S%H2236>thereon,<s%> and to sprinkle blood <S%H1818>thereon.<s%>

You shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who are of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok,<s%> who are <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H8334>me,<s%> to minister to <S%H5002>me,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of its <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H702>it,<s%> and on the four <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H5835>ledge,<s%> and on the <S%H1366>border<s%> all <S%H5439>around:<s%> thus you shall <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> it and make atonement for <S%H3722>it.<s%>

You shall also <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and it shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the appointed <S%H4662>place<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

On the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering;<s%> and they shall <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> as they <S%H2398>cleansed<s%> it with the <S%H6499>bull.<s%>

When you have finished <S%H2398>cleansing<s%> <S%H7126>it,<s%> you shall offer a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

You shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> them near <S%H6440>to<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H4417>salt<s%> on <S%H5927>them,<s%> and they shall offer them up for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> every <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering:<s%> they shall also <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>
<S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall they make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> and <S%H3722>purify<s%> <S%H4390>it;<s%> so shall they consecrate it.

When they have <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> the <S%H3117>days,<s%> it shall be that on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H1973>forward,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and your peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and I will <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H5002>you,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
